resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105909</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105909</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205981</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Calendars Through the Ages</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kalender durch das Alter</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Calendriers par les âges</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Calendários com as idades</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Calendarii con le età</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ημερολόγια μέσω των ηλικιών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Calendarios con las edades</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">looks at the astronomical basis of calendars, the history of our (Gregorian) calendar, and when various countries moved from the Julian to the Gregorian calendar. Learn about Leap Year, the solar cycle, equinoxes and solstices.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Mathematics and Statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">betrachtet die astronomische Grundlage der 
Kalender, die Geschichte unseres (gregorianischen) Kalenders und als 
verschiedene Länder vom julianischen auf den Gregorianischen Kalender
bewogen. Erlernen Sie über Schaltjahr, die Solarschleife, die 
Äquinoktiken und die Sonnenwenden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">regarde la base astronomique des calendriers, 
l'histoire de notre calendrier (grégorien), et quand les divers pays 
se sont déplacés du julien au calendrier grégorien. 
Renseignez-vous sur l'année bissextile, le cycle solaire, des 
équinoxes et des solstices.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">olha a base astronômica dos calendários, o 
history de nosso calendário (gregorian), e quando os vários países 
se moveram do julian para o calendário gregorian. Aprenda sobre
o ano de pulo, o ciclo solar, equinócios e solstices.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">guarda la base astronomica dei calendarii, la 
storia del nostro calendario (gregorian) e quando i vari paesi si sono
mossi dal julian verso il calendario gregorian. Impari circa 
l'anno di salto, il ciclo solare, gli equinozi ed i solstices.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εξετάζει την αστρονομική βάση των ημερολογίων, η 
ιστορία (του γρηγοριανού) ημερολογίου μας, και όταν κινήθηκαν οι 
διάφορες χώρες από το ιουλιανό προς το γρηγοριανό ημερολόγιο. 
Μάθετε για το έτος πηδήματος, τον ηλιακούς κύκλο, 
equinoxes και τα solstices.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">mira la base astronómica de calendarios, la 
historia de nuestro calendario (gregoriano), y cuando los varios 
países se movieron desde el julian al calendario gregoriano. 
Aprenda sobre año bisiesto, el ciclo solar, equinoccios y 
solsticios.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mathematik und Statistiken</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mathématiques et statistiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Matemática e statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Matematica e statistiche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μαθηματικά και στατιστικές</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Matemáticas y estadística</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205981</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105909</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/calendars-through-the-ages</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
